Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Central Park
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Kedzie, 71st, Pulaski and 79th due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Kedzie, 71st, Pulaski and 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #171 Univ. of Chgo/Hyde Park Temporary Northbound Reroute near 53rd/Hyde Park
ShortDescription: Northbound 171 Univ. of Chgo/Hyde Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, 53rd, Lake Park and 55th due to street blockage near 53rd/Hyde Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #171 Univ. of Chgo/Hyde Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, 53rd, Lake Park and 55th, due to street blockage near 53rd/Hyde Park.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
